ModMetaData.name: Killzone Concept Armor Set
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Killzone Concept Armor Art by Kimplate
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Heavy Trooper Helmet - Heavy Trooper Armor - StA25 Vlug - StA-3 Light Machine Gun
[h1]ResearchPrerequisite:[/h1] - Fabrication: Heavy Trooper Helmet and Armor - PrecisionRifling: StA25 Vlug,StA-3 Light Machine Gun
Commissioned for "MeatyClackers#6999" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Kimplate - Killzone Concept Armor Art -Killzone -JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
[url=https://discord.gg/7B7xqHh][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
